<br><br><h3>
I'm interested in how the brain controls the focus of attention, why attention operates the way it does, and what the implications are for living in chronically distracting environments.
<br><br>
In my research I use EEG and fMRI to investigate the neural processes involved in attention control.
<br><br>
I'm on [Research Gate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Sean_Noah), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/seannoah), and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/seannoah/).
